field.name: summary
field.value: ViewComponent's resources support & Embedded images resources support

field.name: description
field.value:
Hi,
I just finished to add support for ViewComponents resources and embedded images resources.
This is done the same way as for the Controllers : you add a Resource attribute to the ViewComponent and you're done. It is also possible to link resource files containing images the same way (this is a little limitation, embedded images resources must be inside a resource file and not just in the assembly and marked as embedded).
As discussed with Hamilton, I had to make a lot of changes for this to works.
I've also made the required modifications in the NVelocity and Brail viewengines.
All tests projects pass.
I havn't added specific tests for the ViewComponent's resources and images resources in the MonoRail solution, but I created those tests in the Castle.Components.Localization contrib project which I will submit when this patch will be reviewed and, hopefully, applied :-) All tests pass too.
I hope you'll like this guys :-)
Cheers,
Gildas
